alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 20 at 6:51PM EDT until October 20 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Lee County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... West central Johnston County in central North Carolina... Eastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 651 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Pittsboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Pittsboro, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Apex, Holly Springs, Morrisville, and Crosswinds Boating Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
